page.title: 20TRANSPORT, CHELWOOD GATE
page.content:
Two former turnpike roads run through the area; A22 London/Eastbourne and A275 Lewes road joining the A22 at Wych Cross, a former turnpike, at the northern end of the area. There are also a few minor tarred roads and various unmade tracks. The only form of PUBLIC TRANSPORT are buses running very infrequently to E.Grinstead, Haywards Heath, Uckfield, Thornton Heath, Brighton, Worthing, Hastings and Eastbourne. Due to the infrequency of the bus ervices, particularly early morning and evening and on Sunday, most families own one or more cars as many people have to use a car to travel to work.
CHELWOOD GATE DOMESDAY GROUP
